subject: Re: [junit] Need Info
msgSnippet: ... When tests are automated, I can run them more frequently. When I run tests more frequently, I get more feedback from them. When I get more feedback from
messageBody:
Mamata V Hegde wrote:
> Hi All,
> I have a question
> Could any one please answer for this ??
>
> Why Do we go For Automation during Unit Testing?

When tests are automated, I can run them more frequently.
When I run tests more frequently, I get more feedback from them.
When I get more feedback from them, I do better work.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
